content.raw:
The URDF to SDF conversion fails when run in trusty and ignores fixed joints instead of collapsing them properly. This can be seen by running gzsdf print on the attached URDF. In trusty it looks the attached pacgoat-trusty.sdf when it should look like pacgoat-good.sdf

The first visible difference is that Chassis_collision_Bumpers is missing from the trusty version.

Suspicion is that this is related to the version of urdfdom distributed with trusty.
content.html:
The URDF to SDF conversion fails when run in trusty and ignores fixed joints instead of collapsing them properly. This can be seen by running gzsdf print on the attached URDF. In trusty it looks the attached pacgoat-trusty.sdf when it should look like pacgoat-good.sdf

The first visible difference is that Chassis_collision_Bumpers is missing from the trusty version.

Suspicion is that this is related to the version of urdfdom distributed with trusty.
